title.rendered: Does Nutrition Promote Neurological Recovery After Acute Brain Injury?

content.rendered:
Yes! Nutritional status can be optimized in both pediatric and adult TBI populations to promotes neurologic recovery. See our recent publication on the topic:

Learn More

excerpt.rendered: Yes! Nutritional status can be optimized in both pediatric and adult TBI populations to promotes neurologic recovery. See our recent publication on the topic:
